title: Metaplay debuts Unity-based SDK to help scale mobile games
description:
Metaplay, known for its fully customisable backend for game development, has debuted a Unity-based SDK to help developers scale their mobile games. Developed over four years in collaboration with top-tier game studios in Helsinki – including Metacore, Dodreams, and Nitro – the Metaplay SDK is designed to empower developers and studios in creating top-tier online... Read more »

The post Metaplay debuts Unity-based SDK to help scale mobile games appeared first on Developer Tech News.
